title: Designing for Children- In the buildings, including toilet, meant for the predominant use by children, it will be mandatory to adjust the height of the handrail and other fittings and fixtures, etc
clause_text: Designing for Children- In the buildings, including toilet, meant for the predominant use by children, it will be mandatory to adjust the height of the handrail and other fittings and fixtures, etc. suitably. Protruded objects in the common areas or common ways Objects or obstructions, with their leading edges at any height above
